explanation: [0-0] In a bright room, a man with silver-grey hair wearing white shoes, a colorful t-shirt, and shorts is standing next to a little girl wearing a black top and black shorts. The man is looking down at the little girl, while the little girl is looking up ahead. Behind them is a white wall, with three blue line drawings hanging on the wall to the left of the frame.

[0-2] As the camera zooms in, the silver-grey haired man smiles and bends down, looking at the little girl in the black top. The little girl in the black top, standing on the grey floor, keeps smiling and looking straight ahead.
